Title: Jaded Heart
Description:
The more powerful remnants of that horrible manifestation may be too much for you to handle on your own, $n.

I fear I'd be of little help in terms of actual combat, but I can suggest a solution.

The great jade statue was soon to become a living serpent - one of our revered celestials. Its construction imbued it with special powers that may sufficiently weaken these adversaries.
ObjectivesText: Use Celestial Jade Chunks to defeat 6 Sha Remnants.
RewardText:
<Cho looks at you despondently.>

This jade was meant for... so much more.
